headline.main: DeRozan, Powell Lead Raptors Past Wizards 114-106
headline.print_headline: DeRozan, Powell Lead Raptors Past Wizards 114-106

lead_paragraph: Mark Streit was dealt from Philadelphia to Tampa Bay to Pittsburgh in the span of a few hours at the trade deadline on Wednesday.
